trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of panels in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa a coleção de painéis em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class stores the panels displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> classe armazena os painéis exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: Each object in the collection is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class which defines the display characteristics and behaviors of a panel displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto na coleção é uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe que define as características de exibição e os comportamentos de um painel exibido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to add panels to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Há várias maneiras de adicionar painéis à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method provides the ability to add a single panel to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método fornece a capacidade de adicionar um painel simples à coleção.

trans-unit.source: To add a number of panels to the collection, you create an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um número de painéis à coleção, você pode criar uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos e atribuí-la para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you want to insert a panel at a specific location within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser inserir um painel em um local específico na coleção, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To remove panels, you can use either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method if you know where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Para remover painéis, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> método se você souber qual painel está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method enables you to remove all panels from the collection instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a single panel at a time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> método permite que você remova todos os painéis da coleção em vez de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> método para remover um único painel de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing panels, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> also provides methods to find panels within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Além dos métodos e propriedades para adicionar e remover painéis, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> também fornece métodos para localizar painéis dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> método permite que você determine se um painel é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Once you know that the panel is located within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando você souber que o painel está localizado dentro da coleção, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> método para determinar qual painel está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control that contains this collection.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> que contém esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar uma instância dessa classe sem associá-lo com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The text for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that is being added.
trans-unit.target: O texto para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que está sendo adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified text to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com o texto especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle para exibir mais de um tipo de informação.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the text specified in the `text` parameter and adds it to collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> com o texto especificado no `text` parâmetro e o adiciona à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual os painéis estão localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> representa a ordem de painéis são exibidos dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Painéis são exibidos da esquerda para direita a partir do primeiro painel na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle não altera a ordem na qual os painéis são exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para inserir um painel em uma posição específica na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um conjunto de painéis para a coleção em uma única operação, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle para exibir mais de um tipo de informação.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> specified in the `value` parameter to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método adiciona o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> especificado no `value` parâmetro à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual os painéis estão localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> representa a ordem de painéis são exibidos dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Painéis são exibidos da esquerda para direita a partir do primeiro painel na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle não altera a ordem na qual os painéis são exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para inserir um painel em uma posição específica na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um conjunto de painéis para a coleção em uma única operação, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos, denominados `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> being added to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que está sendo adicionado à coleção era <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> specified in the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O pai do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> especificado no parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects to add.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle para exibir mais de um tipo de informação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method adds an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects specified in the `panels` parameter to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> método adiciona uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos especificados no `panels` parâmetro à coleção.

trans-unit.source: All existing panels in the collection are removed from the collection before inserting new panels.
trans-unit.target: Todos os painéis existentes na coleção são removidos da coleção antes de inserir novos painéis.

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual os painéis estão localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> representa a ordem de painéis são exibidos dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Painéis são exibidos da esquerda para direita a partir do primeiro painel na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle não altera a ordem na qual os painéis são exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: To add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> à coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control (and in this collection), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para inserir um painel em uma posição específica a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle (e na coleção), use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects being added to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que está sendo adicionada à coleção era <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens da coleção.

trans-unit.source: When you remove panels from the collection, all information about the deleted panels is lost.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover painéis da coleção, todas as informações sobre os painéis excluídos são perdidas.

trans-unit.source: To remove a single panel from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um único painel do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o painel especificado está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the panel is located within the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o painel estiver localizado na coleção; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> método permite que você determine se um painel é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando você souber que o item está localizado dentro da coleção, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> método para determinar qual painel está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to find in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do item a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a coleção contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the collection contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a coleção contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> propriedade corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A chave comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.ContainsKey%2A> returns `false.`
trans-unit.target: Se o `key` parâmetro é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.ContainsKey%2A> retorna `false.`

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the number of panels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você determine o número de painéis de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse valor quando são percorrer os valores da coleção e é necessário fornecer um número de iterações para executar o loop.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator to use to iterate through the item collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador a ser usado para iterar pela coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that represents the item collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> que representa a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index within the collection of the specified panel.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice na coleção do painel especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the panel is located within the collection; otherwise, negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero no qual o painel está localizado na coleção; caso contrário, um negativo (-1).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method enables you to determine where a panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> método permite que você determine onde um painel está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether an item is located within the collection before calling this method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um item está localizado dentro da coleção antes de chamar esse método, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to find in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice da primeira ocorrência de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> é chamado sucessivamente, a última retornou o índice será verificado para uma correspondência de chave pela primeira vez e se não houver nenhuma correspondência, a pesquisa começa no início da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> propriedade corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A chave comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o `key` parâmetro é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location where the panel is inserted.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual o painel é inserido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel to insert.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> especificado na coleção, no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle para exibir mais de um tipo de informação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method enables you to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and insert it at a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> método permite que você crie um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> e inseri-lo em um local específico na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem na qual os painéis estão localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> representa a ordem de painéis são exibidos dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Painéis são exibidos da esquerda para direita a partir do primeiro painel na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle não altera a ordem na qual os painéis são exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: To add a panel to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um painel ao final da coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um conjunto de painéis para a coleção em uma única operação, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter's parent is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O pai do parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter's panel is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" /> value.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> do painel do parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não é um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se esta coleção é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is always `false` for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é sempre `false` para esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an item within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the panel in the collection to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O índice do painel na coleção a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel located at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel localizado no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> stored at a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> armazenados em um local específico na coleção.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a specific panel within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice de um painel específico dentro da coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero ou maior ou igual ao valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> assigned to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> atribuído à coleção era <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do item a ser recuperado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets an item with the specified key from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um item com a chave especificada da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> propriedade corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A chave comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Item%2A> returns `null.`
trans-unit.target: Se o `key` parâmetro é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Item%2A> retorna `null.`

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o apinel a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: When you remove a panel from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remove um painel da lista, os índices alterar subsequentes itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed panel is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Todas as informações sobre o painel removido são excluídas.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> by specifying the actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para remover um painel específico do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> especificando real <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To specify the index of the panel to remove instead of the panel itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o índice do painel para remover, em vez do próprio painel, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To remove all panels from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover todos os painéis da coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> assigned to the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> atribuído ao parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do item a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> located at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> no índice especificado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: When you remove a panel from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent panels in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover um painel da coleção, os índices de alterar para painéis subsequentes na coleção.

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed panel is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Todas as informações sobre o painel removido são excluídas.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the list by specifying the index of the panel to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para remover um painel específico da lista especificando o índice do painel para remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To specify the panel to remove instead of the index to the panel, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o painel para remover, em vez do índice para o painel, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To remove all panels from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover todos os painéis do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controlar, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero ou maior ou igual ao valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> com a chave especificada da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> propriedade corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A chave comparação não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero na matriz em que a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> para uma matriz unidimensional compatível, iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> é maior do que o espaço disponível do índice até o final do <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo na coleção não pode ser convertido automaticamente no tipo de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à coleção é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: O pai do valor não é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o painel especificado está localizado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if panel is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> located within the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o painel for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> localizado na coleção; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified panel within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice do painel especificado dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of panel, if found, within the entire collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do painel, se encontrado, dentro da coleção inteira; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location where the panel is inserted.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual o painel é inserido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to insert.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser inserido.

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do elemento a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> especificado da coleção.
